title: Jasmine "I Am Loved" Affirmation Candle - 17.5 oz
description:
Â 

Indulge in the sweet fragrance of our "I Am Loved" Jasmine coconut wax candle. The perfect blend of lemon and ginger top notes, combined with the floral scents of jasmine and honeysuckle, creates a soothing atmosphere in your home. The grounding base notes of wood, violet, amyris, and powder promote relaxation and calmness, making it perfect for a night in or as part of your self-care routine. This reusable clear jar candle features two flat braided cotton wicks that are lead and zinc-free, ensuring a clean and pet-friendly burn. Experience approximately 60+ hours of burn time and feel the love in the air.
